meanings.definition: A person who claims to have a supernatural ability to perceive events in the future or beyond normal sensory contact.
meanings.sent1: The clairvoyant predicted the outcome of the game before it even started.
meanings.sent2: She consulted a clairvoyant to learn about her future.
meanings.sent3: The clairvoyant joked that they could see the future but not what was for dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her accuracy as a clairvoyant was as clear as a crystal ball.
meanings.sent5: The clairvoyant's visions were like watching a movie of tomorrow.

meanings.definition: Having or exhibiting an ability to perceive events in the future or beyond normal sensory contact.
meanings.sent1: The clairvoyant dream felt so real, she woke up expecting it to come true.
meanings.sent2: He had a clairvoyant intuition that the project would be successful.
meanings.sent3: The clairvoyant cat seemed to know when it was time for treats.
meanings.sent4: Her clairvoyant insight into people's emotions was uncanny.
meanings.sent5: The clairvoyant sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and gold.
